channel.title: Interviews on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Interviews on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: What if Tedium … Had Lyrics?
item.description: As our readers are now undoubtedly aware, there are two things I’m incredibly interested in—unique types of music and the history/technical aspects/playing the games of the original Nintendo Entertainment System (I’m also really into miniatures, FWIW). Knowing this, it was only a matter of time before I discovered someone who combined these two interests into one. Unlike U2, circa 1987, I found what I was looking for almost a decade ago.
